item.title: Why Is Nebius Stock Rising Pre-Market Today?
item.description: The stock rallied over 6% pre-market on Thursday after the specifics of its $19.4 billion deal with Microsoft Corp. were reportedly revealed.

item.title: Fermi Stock Continues To Soar After Strong Debut On Nasdaq Yesterday
item.description: The Amarillo, Texas-based data center real estate investment trust raised $682.5 million through the IPO, with 32.5 million shares on offer.

item.title: DraftKings Shares Rebound 2% In Premarket As Kalshi Challenge Worries Abate

item.title: Bloom Energy Stock Pauses After Record Run Fueled By AI Infra-Demand - Here’s The Catalyst That Is Driving Downside In Premarket
item.description: Analysts’ consensus price target on the stock is $53.58, implying roughly 41% downside from Wednesday’s close

item.title: Why Is Mondelez Stock Down In Premarket Today
item.description: An analyst believes that cocoa prices and weak European demand are not adequately priced in Wall Street's earnings for Mondelez.
